ResourceHeader.ResourceName: STEREO-A IMPACT/MAG and PLASTIC 10-Min Magnetic Field and Plasma Parameters
ResourceHeader.Description: This data product contains 10-m overlapped averages of solar wind magnetic field (RTN) and plasma data taken by the IMPACT/Magnetometer and PLASTIC instruments on STEREO-A. The interface allows selection of STEREO A or STEREO B data and of spacecraft coordinates in any of 5 coordinate systems. It also allows selection of any of three parameter sets: [V, N, T, entropy, beta, total pressure], [Bx, By, Bz, |B|, X, Y, Z, R] or [RBx, RBy, RBz, |B|, X, Y, Z, R]. Further, the interface enables easy migration between plot vs. ASCII data presentation options and among the three available resolutions (1m, 10m, 1h).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the IMPACT PI, Dr. Janet Luhmann (UCB), the Key Persons for the IMPACT Magnetometer (C. Smith, Bartol) and the late M. Acuna (GSFC), and the PLASTIC PI, Dr. Antoinette Galvin (UNH).

InformationURL.Name: IMPACT MAG data-descriptive page at UCLA page

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the IMPACT PI, Dr. Janet Luhmann (UCB), the Key Persons for IMPACT/MAG, Drs. C. Smith (Bartol) and the late M. Acuna (GSFC), the PLASTIC PI, Dr. Antoinette Galvin (UNH), and Dr. C.T. Russell (UCLA) for the data interface.

TimeSpan.Note: As of June 23, 2009, last magnetic field data were for December 31, 2008, and last plasma data were for September 30, 1998.

NumericalData.Caveats: Later-processed PLASTIC data is available from UNH. See the relevant VSPO descriptor. PLASTIC data at the UCLA site should not be used.
